resources.string: You can use this utility to flash boot animations that come in the bootanimation.zip format.\n\nThe zip can be named anything you wish, but must not be a flashable zip. The installer won\'t let you continue unless it is an appropriate file.
Show the reboot dialog after making a selection?
Reboot and allow any CWM/TWRP flashable zips to be flashed and your device reboot with a single click, no user interaction required. The reboot toggle above is not honoured with this setting.
Animation Set… Reboot to view it
Open Recovery Script disabled (see settings) Please reboot to recovery and flash manually. Alternatively, enable ORS in the settings.
Wipe /data/dalvik-cache and /cache when using open recovery script
